taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section flagellares;species injunctus;

treatment.description: Slender trailer, the canes 2.5-4 mm. thick, with straightish retrorse slender prickles about 3.5 mm. long; primocane-leaves 5-foliolate, soft-pilose beneath; the leaflets caudate-acuminate, finely double-serrate, the terminal long-petiolulate leaflet elliptic-oval; terminal acute floricane-leaflet narrowly rhombic-obovate; corymbs 2-5-flowered, the pilose or villous erect pedicels mostly much longer than their subtending bracts; petals oblanceolate, distant, 5 or 6 mm. broad.
